text: Guy Geoffroy (born 26 May 1949 in Paris) is a French wrestler. He represents the Seine-et-Marne department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:United Republic politicians Category:Mayors of places in Île-de- France Category:Chevaliers of the Légion d'honneur Category:Knights of the National Order of Merit (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Guy Geoffroy
